content:
ClientCredentialsElement Class

Definition

Represents a configuration element that configures a client credential.

In this Article

public class ClientCredentialsElement : System.ServiceModel.Configuration.BehaviorExtensionElement
Inheritance
Object
ConfigurationElement
ServiceModelConfigurationElement
ServiceModelExtensionElement
BehaviorExtensionElement
ClientCredentialsElement

Constructors

ClientCredentialsElement()

Initializes a new instance of the ClientCredentialsElement class.

public ClientCredentialsElement ();

Properties

BehaviorType

Gets the type of this behavior element.

public override Type BehaviorType { get; }
Value
Type

The type of this behavior element.

ClientCertificate

Gets the client certificate to be used when the client certificate is available out-of-band.

public System.ServiceModel.Configuration.X509InitiatorCertificateClientElement ClientCertificate { get; }
Value
X509InitiatorCertificateClientElement

A X509InitiatorCertificateClientElement that specifies the client certificate to be used when the client certificate is available out-of-band.

Attributes
ConfigurationPropertyAttribute

Remarks

This element also specifies client certificate validation settings.

HttpDigest

Gets the configuration element that configures the current HTTP digest credential.

public System.ServiceModel.Configuration.HttpDigestClientElement HttpDigest { get; }
Value
HttpDigestClientElement

A HttpDigestClientElement that configures the current HTTP digest credential.

Attributes
ConfigurationPropertyAttribute

IssuedToken

Gets the configuration element that configures the current issued token instance.

public System.ServiceModel.Configuration.IssuedTokenClientElement IssuedToken { get; }
Value
IssuedTokenClientElement

An IssuedTokenClientElement that configures the current issued token.

Attributes
ConfigurationPropertyAttribute

Peer

Gets the configuration element that configures the current peer credential.

public System.ServiceModel.Configuration.PeerCredentialElement Peer { get; }
Value
PeerCredentialElement

A PeerCredentialElement that configures the current peer credential.

Attributes
ConfigurationPropertyAttribute

Properties

Gets a ConfigurationPropertyCollection instance that contains a collection of ConfigurationProperty objects that can be attributes or ConfigurationElement objects of this configuration element.

protected override System.Configuration.ConfigurationPropertyCollection Properties { get; }
Value
ConfigurationPropertyCollection

A ConfigurationPropertyCollection instance that contains a collection of ConfigurationProperty objects that can be attributes or ConfigurationElement objects of this configuration element.

ServiceCertificate

Gets an X.509 certificate initiated by a client.

public System.ServiceModel.Configuration.X509RecipientCertificateClientElement ServiceCertificate { get; }
Value
X509RecipientCertificateClientElement

A X509RecipientCertificateClientElement that specifies an X.509 certificate initiated by a client.

Attributes
ConfigurationPropertyAttribute

SupportInteractive

Gets or sets a boolean value that specifies whether the credential supports interactive negotiation.

public bool SupportInteractive { get; set; }
Value
Boolean

true if the credential supports interactive negotiation; otherwise, false. The default is true.

Attributes
ConfigurationPropertyAttribute

Type

Gets the type of this configuration element.

public string Type { get; set; }
Value
String

A string containing the type of this configuration element.

Attributes
ConfigurationPropertyAttribute StringValidatorAttribute

UseIdentityConfiguration

Gets or sets whether the client credentials uses identity configuration.

public bool UseIdentityConfiguration { get; set; }
Value
Boolean

True if the client credentials uses identity configuration; otherwise, false.

Attributes
ConfigurationPropertyAttribute

Windows

Gets the settings for Windows credential validation.

public System.ServiceModel.Configuration.WindowsClientElement Windows { get; }
Value
WindowsClientElement

A WindowsClientElement that specifies the settings for Windows credential validation.

Attributes
ConfigurationPropertyAttribute

Methods

ApplyConfiguration(ClientCredentials)

Applies the content of a specified configuration element to this configuration element.

protected void ApplyConfiguration (System.ServiceModel.Description.ClientCredentials behavior);
Parameters
behavior
ClientCredentials

A configuration element to be applied.

CopyFrom(ServiceModelExtensionElement)

Copies the content of the specified configuration element to this configuration element.

public override void CopyFrom (System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ServiceModelExtensionElement from);
Parameters
from
ServiceModelExtensionElement

The configuration element to be copied.

CreateBehavior()

Creates a custom behavior based on the settings of this configuration element.

protected override object CreateBehavior ();
Returns
Object

A custom behavior based on the settings of this configuration element.
